document.full_text: a yale university lab technician pleaded guilty on thursday to the murder and attempted sexual assault of a graduate student whose body was found inside the wall of a campus building on the day she was due to be married in 2009.
document.title: lab technician pleads guilty in yale student murder
lines_and_colors: a yale university lab technician pleaded guilty on thursday to the murder and attempted sexual assault of a graduate student whose body was found inside the wall of a campus building on the day she was due to be married in 2009.
